hero.title: Break Free from ServiceNow Vendor Lock-in
hero.subtitle: The open-source alternative to ServiceNow Build Agent. Use YOUR approved AI models. Built by developers, for developers. Autonomous story completion from Jira & Azure DevOps.

devProminence.label: The Last User Story You'll Ever Need
devProminence.title: Write once. Deploy forever.
devProminence.storyDesc: As a ServiceNow developer, I want to use my preferred AI model so that I'm not locked into a single vendor's ecosystem.
devProminence.criteria1: Support for 75+ AI providers including Claude, GPT-4, Gemini, and local models
devProminence.criteria2: Full MCP protocol implementation with 500+ specialized tools
devProminence.criteria3: Integration with Jira, Azure DevOps, and GitHub for autonomous story completion
devProminence.criteria4: Zero vendor lock-in - switch AI models without changing workflows

why.label: The Problem We Solve
why.title: ServiceNow's AI comes with strings attached
why.subtitle: Build Agent locks you into NowLLM. Snow-Flow lets you use ANY AI model your organization has already approved.
why.problem1: Locked to NowLLM only - no choice in AI models
why.problem6: Can't use your company's approved AI models
why.solution1: 75+ AI providers - Claude, GPT, DeepSeek, local models
why.solution2: Any IDE - VS Code, Cursor, JetBrains, terminal
why.solution4: Free forever or $99/mo for managed cloud
why.solution6: Use ONLY your organization's approved models

autonomous.label: Autonomous Development
autonomous.title: From issue to deployed code.
autonomous.subtitle: Connect your project management tools. Snow-Flow reads requirements, writes code, creates update sets, and deploys—all without manual intervention.
autonomous.jiraDesc: Pull stories directly from Jira. Snow-Flow reads requirements, builds solutions, and updates ticket status automatically.
autonomous.azureDesc: Sync with Azure DevOps work items. Full bidirectional sync keeps your boards and ServiceNow in perfect harmony.
autonomous.githubDesc: Turn GitHub issues into deployed ServiceNow code. Automated commits, PRs, and deployment tracking.
autonomous.gitlabDesc: Native GitLab support for issues, merge requests, and CI/CD pipeline triggers.
autonomous.updateSetsDesc: Every story gets its own update set. Clean separation, easy rollback, audit-ready deployments.
autonomous.confluenceDesc: Auto-generate technical documentation in Confluence. Keep stakeholders informed automatically.
autonomous.kbDesc: Create and update ServiceNow Knowledge Base articles as part of your development workflow.
autonomous.multiAgentDesc: Specialized AI agents work together. Code review, testing, documentation—all running in parallel.

comparison.title: Snow-Flow vs ServiceNow Build Agent
comparison.aiSnowFlow: 75+ providers: Claude, GPT-4, Gemini, DeepSeek, Llama, local models
comparison.ideSnowFlow: Any IDE: VS Code, Cursor, JetBrains, Vim, terminal
comparison.integrationsSnowFlow: Jira, Azure DevOps, GitHub, GitLab, Confluence
comparison.complianceSnowFlow: Your data stays in your infrastructure

faq.label: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.title: Common Questions
faq.q1: What makes Snow-Flow different from ServiceNow Build Agent?
faq.a1: Snow-Flow is open source and lets you use any AI model your organization has approved (75+ providers including Claude, GPT, DeepSeek, and local models). Build Agent locks you into NowLLM only. Snow-Flow also works in any IDE, not just the browser-based Studio. Including any MID server you already have.
faq.q2: How does the Enterprise portal help my team?
faq.a2: The Enterprise portal provides real-time visibility into all AI agent activities, centralized update set management, and automatic sync with Jira, Azure DevOps, and Confluence. Stakeholders can safely query ServiceNow without write access.
faq.q3: Can I try Snow-Flow before committing to Enterprise?
faq.a3: Absolutely! Snow-Flow is 100% open source and free to use. Install it with npm, connect to your ServiceNow instance, and start building. Enterprise adds the portal, integrations, and stakeholder seats when you're ready to scale.
